meanings.sent1: The tall building had a multilevels design, with different floors for offices and shops.
meanings.sent2: The cake had a multilevels structure, with layers of chocolate and cream.
meanings.sent3: The multilevels puzzle was challenging to solve, but it was fun trying to figure it out.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a multilevels maze, each idea leading to another twist.
meanings.sent5: The multilevels garden was a sight to behold, with flowers at different heights creating a beautiful display.

meanings.definition: Involving or consisting of multiple levels.
meanings.sent1: The multilevels project required coordination between teams at different levels of expertise.
meanings.sent2: The multilevels game had various challenges that tested players at different stages.
meanings.sent3: The multilevels competition kept everyone on their toes, wondering what the next level would bring.
meanings.sent4: His multilevels thinking allowed him to see connections others might miss.
meanings.sent5: The multilevels approach to learning ensured that students understood concepts thoroughly before moving on.

meanings.definition: A system or structure with multiple levels.
meanings.sent1: The company had a multilevels hierarchy, with managers overseeing different departments.
meanings.sent2: The multilevels of the building included offices, meeting rooms, and a cafeteria.
meanings.sent3: The multilevels of the cake made it a showstopper at the party, revealing different flavors with each layer.
meanings.sent4: The multilevels of the organization allowed for clear communication between different teams.
meanings.sent5: The multilevels of the mountain provided hikers with stunning views at various heights.
